key.name: ctrl-G
key.desc: AP: toggle glide slope + vor loc

PropertyList.text: Takeoff : rotation 180 kt (full load), 170 kt (landing load), flaps 20. trim before engaging autopilot. Climb : 1000 ft/min, 220 kt. retract flaps with autothrottle : 10 / 220, 5 / 240, 1 / 250. 1500 ft/min above 5000 ft. 300 kt above 10000 ft. 1200 ft/min above FL150. 1000 ft/min, 0.82 mach above FL240. Cruise : 0.84 mach. Descent : at 250 NM (38000 ft). 1000 ft/min, 0.84 mach until FL240. decelerate to 290 kt until FL100. 250 kt until approach. Approach : 160 kt (landing load), 150 kt (empty tank), flaps 20. 15 NM at 3000 ft, below glide slope. Final : 160 kt (landing load), 150 kt (empty tank), 140 kt (empty weight), flaps 30. arm spoilers. Landing : 154 kt (landing load), 140 kt (empty tank). touch down below 400 ft/min.
